TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISharePointConnection implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 提供可用于执行 SharePoint 命令的方法，该命令在 Visual Studio 中从 SharePoint 工具扩展调用到 SharePoint 服务器对象模型。

span.span: Provides methods you can use to execute SharePoint commands that call into the SharePoint server object model from an extension of the SharePoint tools in Visual Studio.

remarks.format: ## Remarks *SharePoint 命令*是可用于在 SharePoint 工具扩展中调入 SharePoint 服务器对象模型的方法。*SharePoint commands* are methods that can be used in a SharePoint tools extension to call into the SharePoint server object model. 定义 SharePoint 命令后，您可以通过获取执行它对象，然后再调用之一`ExecuteCommand`方法。After you define a SharePoint command, you can execute it by obtaining an object and then calling one of the `ExecuteCommand` methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 执行 SharePoint 命令](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-execute-a-sharepoint-command)。For more information, see [How to: Execute a SharePoint Command](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-execute-a-sharepoint-command).

summary.span: 获取此 SharePoint 连接的身份验证模式。

span.span: Gets the authentication mode for this SharePoint connection.

value.span: 此 SharePoint 连接的身份验证模式。

span.span: The authentication mode for this SharePoint connection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ExecuteCommand(string commandId) cil managed

param.name: commandId
param.span: 要执行的 SharePoint 命令的标识符。

span.span: The identifier of the SharePoint command to execute.

summary.span: 使用指定的标识符执行 SharePoint 命令。

span.span: Executes the SharePoint command with the specified identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法以执行 SharePoint 命令具有任何自定义的参数或返回值。Use this method to execute a SharePoint command that has no custom parameter or return value. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 SharePoint 命令](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-command)并[如何： 执行 SharePoint 命令](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-execute-a-sharepoint-command)。For more information, see [How to: Create a SharePoint Command](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-command) and [How to: Execute a SharePoint Command](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-execute-a-sharepoint-command).

exception.span: 与 SharePoint 连接时发生错误。

span.span: An error occurred while connecting to SharePoint.

exception.span: 与任何可用的 SharePoint 命令都不匹配。

span.span: does not match any available SharePoint commands.

exception.span: SharePoint 命令失败引发异常。

span.span: An exception was thrown by the SharePoint command.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ExecuteCommand<T> (string commandId, T arg);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ExecuteCommand<T>(string commandId, !!T arg) cil managed

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 要执行的 SharePoint 命令的参数的类型。

span.span: The type of the parameter of the SharePoint command to execute.

typeparam.span: 这必须是可由 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 序列化的类型。

span.span: This must be a type that can be serialized by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF).

param.name: commandId
param.span: 要执行的 SharePoint 命令的标识符。

span.span: The identifier of the SharePoint command to execute.

param.name: arg
param.span: 要传递给 SharePoint 命令的参数。

span.span: The argument to pass to the SharePoint command.

summary.span: 使用指定的标识符和参数类型执行 SharePoint 命令。

span.span: Executes the SharePoint command with the specified identifier and parameter type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法来执行 SharePoint 命令具有自定义参数，但没有返回值。Use this method to execute a SharePoint command that has a custom parameter but no return value. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 SharePoint 命令](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-command)并[如何： 执行 SharePoint 命令](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-execute-a-sharepoint-command)。For more information, see [How to: Create a SharePoint Command](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-command) and [How to: Execute a SharePoint Command](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-execute-a-sharepoint-command). 有关可序列化由 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 的类型的详细信息，请参阅[类型支持的数据协定序列化程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7381b200-437a-4506-9556-d77bf1bc3f34)并[使用 XmlSerializer 类](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c680602d-39d3-44f1-bf22-8e6654ad5069)。For more information about types that can be serialized by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF), see [Types Supported by the Data Contract Serializer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7381b200-437a-4506-9556-d77bf1bc3f34) and [Using the XmlSerializer Class](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c680602d-39d3-44f1-bf22-8e6654ad5069).

exception.span: SharePoint 命令的参数类型与 类型不匹配。

span.span: The parameter type of the SharePoint command does not match the type.

exception.span: 与 SharePoint 连接时发生错误。

span.span: An error occurred while connecting to SharePoint.

exception.span: 与任何可用的 SharePoint 命令都不匹配。

span.span: does not match any available SharePoint commands.

exception.span: SharePoint 命令失败引发异常。

span.span: An exception was thrown by the SharePoint command.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !!TResult ExecuteCommand<TResult>(string commandId) cil managed

typeparam.name: TResult
typeparam.span: 要执行的 SharePoint 命令的返回值的类型。

span.span: The type of the return value of the SharePoint command to execute.

typeparam.span: 这必须是可由 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 序列化的类型。

span.span: This must be a type that can be serialized by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF).

param.name: commandId
param.span: 要执行的 SharePoint 命令的标识符。

span.span: The identifier of the SharePoint command to execute.

summary.span: 使用指定的标识符和返回值类型执行 SharePoint 命令。

span.span: Executes the SharePoint command with the specified identifier and return value type.
The return value of the SharePoint command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法来执行 SharePoint 命令的返回值，但没有自定义参数。Use this method to execute a SharePoint command that has a return value but no custom parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 SharePoint 命令](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-command)并[如何： 执行 SharePoint 命令](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-execute-a-sharepoint-command)。For more information, see [How to: Create a SharePoint Command](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-command) and [How to: Execute a SharePoint Command](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-execute-a-sharepoint-command). 有关可序列化由 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 的类型的详细信息，请参阅[类型支持的数据协定序列化程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7381b200-437a-4506-9556-d77bf1bc3f34)并[使用 XmlSerializer 类](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c680602d-39d3-44f1-bf22-8e6654ad5069)。For more information about types that can be serialized by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF), see [Types Supported by the Data Contract Serializer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7381b200-437a-4506-9556-d77bf1bc3f34) and [Using the XmlSerializer Class](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c680602d-39d3-44f1-bf22-8e6654ad5069).

exception.span: SharePoint 命令的返回值类型与 类型不匹配。

span.span: The return value type of the SharePoint command does not match the type.

exception.span: 与 SharePoint 连接时发生错误。

span.span: An error occurred while connecting to SharePoint.

exception.span: 与任何可用的 SharePoint 命令都不匹配。

span.span: does not match any available SharePoint commands.

exception.span: SharePoint 命令失败引发异常。

span.span: An exception was thrown by the SharePoint command.

The return value of the SharePoint command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法来执行 SharePoint 命令具有返回值和自定义参数。Use this method to execute a SharePoint command that has a return value and a custom parameter. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 SharePoint 命令](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-command)并[如何： 执行 SharePoint 命令](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-execute-a-sharepoint-command)。For more information, see [How to: Create a SharePoint Command](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-create-a-sharepoint-command) and [How to: Execute a SharePoint Command](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-execute-a-sharepoint-command). 有关可序列化由 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 的类型的详细信息，请参阅[类型支持的数据协定序列化程序](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7381b200-437a-4506-9556-d77bf1bc3f34)并[使用 XmlSerializer 类](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c680602d-39d3-44f1-bf22-8e6654ad5069)。For more information about types that can be serialized by Windows Communication Foundation (WCF), see [Types Supported by the Data Contract Serializer](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7381b200-437a-4506-9556-d77bf1bc3f34) and [Using the XmlSerializer Class](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c680602d-39d3-44f1-bf22-8e6654ad5069).
